```{r setup}
library(hdos)
library(ggplot2)

```

```{r plotx}
points <- bind_objects(list(rectangle_nd(lengths = c(7,0.1,0.1)),
                            rectangle_nd(lengths = c(8,0.1,0.1),
                                         rot_mat = get_rotation_matrix(0,pi/4,0)),
                            rectangle_nd(lengths = c(6,0.1,0.1),
                                         rot_mat = get_rotation_matrix(0,0,pi/4)),
                            rectangle_nd(lengths = c(6,2,0.1),
                                         rot_mat = get_rotation_matrix(pi/4,0,0))))
rgl3dplot_d(points)
```
